weather.summary: Saturday: 9°C, light rain. Sunday: 11°C, broken clouds

metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend of awesome adventures! We've got train rides, dinosaur discoveries, and muddy farm fun all lined up just for you. Choo-choo!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure (DLR Ride!)
activities.description: Explore London's biggest urban farm with llamas, sheep, and more! Enjoy a fun DLR ride to get there and back. Perfect for a muddy, animal-filled day.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's a double whammy: animals AND a train ride where you can sit at the front!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute, 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit
activities.description: Meet pigs, goats, and chickens at this friendly city farm. Enjoy the cafe and pottery activities. Perfect for a quick animal fix!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of farm animals to see up close!

transport.tip: Check out the pottery activities for a hands-on experience.

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Immerse yourself in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. Let your imagination run wild in this creative space.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Interactive play areas and dressing up are perfect for active little ones.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character meet-and-greets.

activities.title: Young V&A Play Area
activities.description: A dedicated play area for under 5s within the V&A. Design workshops are also available for older children.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Safe and engaging play space for little ones to explore and build.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Liverpool Street, then Central Line to Bethnal Green, 25 mins
transport.tip: Check the museum website for workshop schedules.

activities.title: Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park Playgrounds
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay (sand & water) if the weather is mild. Plenty of space to run and play.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Huge playgrounds with sand and water - perfect for getting muddy!

transport.tip: Bring a change of clothes for Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Victoria Park Adventure
activities.description: Enjoy the two playgrounds, spot deer in the enclosure, and take a stroll around the boating lake. Perfect for a classic park day.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Two playgrounds offer lots of climbing and running fun!

transport.fromHackney: Homerton Overground or Mile End tube, 10 mins
transport.tip: Bring some bread to feed the ducks (but not too much!).

activities.title: Natural History Museum Dinosaur Discovery
activities.description: See the famous T-Rex skeleton and explore the dinosaur gallery. The Blue Whale is also a must-see! The Investigate Centre is great for hands-on learning.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Green Park, then Piccadilly Line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies
transport.tip: Go early to avoid the crowds in the dinosaur gallery.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Adventure
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, experience a tube simulator, and explore the All Aboard play zone. Enjoy the stamper trail for extra fun!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Buses and trains galore, including a tube simulator!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Oxford Circus, then Piccadilly Line to Covent Garden, 40 mins
transport.tube: Covent Garden or Leicester Square (Piccadilly, Northern)
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies
transport.tip: Check out the family activity schedule for special events.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs & Playground
activities.description: See the Victorian dinosaur statues on the islands, explore the farm and maze, and enjoy the great playground. Perfect for a day of outdoor adventure.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Whitechapel, then Overground to Crystal Palace, 50 mins
transport.tip: Bring wellies if it's been raining, as the dinosaur islands can be muddy.

activities.title: National Maritime Museum & Greenwich Park Playground
activities.description: Explore the ships gallery, play in the AHOY! children's gallery (under 7s), and enjoy the great playground outside in Greenwich Park. Consider a Thames Clipper boat ride!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Ships and a playground, plus a boat ride on the Thames!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then DLR to Cutty Sark, 45 mins
transport.tip: Take the Thames Clipper from Tower Pier for a scenic boat ride.

activities.title: RAF Museum London
activities.description: Explore huge aircraft hangers, see a 4D cinema show, and play on the outdoor playground. Perfect for plane enthusiasts!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria Line to Euston, then Northern Line to Colindale, 50 mins
transport.tip: Check the museum website for 4D cinema showtimes.

activities.title: Horniman Museum's Walrus & Gardens
activities.description: Visit the famous overstuffed walrus, explore the instruments gallery, and enjoy the excellent gardens with animals. The aquarium is worth a visit!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Cool animals and gardens to explore!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then Overground to Forest Hill, 45 mins
transport.tip: The gardens are best explored on a sunny day.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: Experience life-size dinosaur puppets in this thrilling live show! Get up close and personal with amazing creatures.

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as this show is very popular.

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: See Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad as they've never been seen before, in this brand-new theatrical adaptation of the Emmy® award-winning television series.

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as this show is very popular.

activities.title: Dear Zoo Live
activities.description: The timeless children's book comes to life on stage! See all your favorite animals in this interactive show.

transport.tip: A great first theatre experience for little ones.

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Join Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig in this musical adventure filled with singing, dancing, and muddy puddles!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Peppa Pig! And maybe some muddy puddles!

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as this show is very popular.

activities.title: The Gruffalo
activities.description: Join Mouse on a daring adventure through the deep, dark wood in this magical stage adaptation of the classic children's book.

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: Hey Duggee is brought to life on stage in a brand new production. Get ready to sing, dance, and earn your Duggee Hug!

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as this show is very popular.
